QuestData.Title: Speaker for the Dead
QuestData.Description: Oh, praise the Light, you're here! Exarch Maladaar asked for me to find you.$B$BWe need your help. Auchindoun is under attack by demons!$B$BGo to the Burning Front to the southwest as soon as possible! You're one of the few people he trusts to help lead the defense.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Exarch Maladaar at the Burning Front in Talador.
QuestData.RewardText: I will not allow a single demon to step foot inside Auchindoun. You will help me ensure that does not happen.
